reviewText: My nephew and family enjoyed this DVD I bought them.
I used this as a resource for a topic on Antarctica. It was graphic and the information relevant
Got to love those penguins,amazing footage,thank you,G.
My four year old grand daughter is crazy about PENGUINS so she is thrilled with this video and loves to watch it with Papaw.
Bought it for the kids who loved it.  Arrived on time and in perfect condition
